title: Input schema for Instagram posts scraper
description: This scraper takes the provided URLs and attempts to scrape instagram posts from each of them. It's able to scrape posts from user profiles, hashtags and places.

urls.title: URLs
urls.description: From which pages should posts be loaded and how many posts to scrape

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.
